text:
“Are you really leaving now?” Sonia asked, worry in her eyes.  

Svidrigaïlov chuckled. “Rain won’t stop me from going to America!”  

“Why do you need to go?”  

He paused, then said, “You’ll need money for him. Understand?”  

Sonia nodded, confused.  

“Don’t mention my visit. Keep this secret.”  

He handed her the money. “Give it to Razumihin. He’s trustworthy.”  

“Why must you go?” she whispered.  

“Goodbye, Sofya Semyonovna. Live well. You’ll help others.”  

He turned to leave, his silhouette fading into the rain.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov advises Sonia to keep money safe for her betrothed and to be discreet about their interactions.
